value.value:
This is an auth protected page. Only authenticated users can view this.

If you are not authenticated, you will be redirected to /refresh-session server-side.

actions.name: setInputValue
actions.description: Sets the value of an input element

actions.name: setInputValue
actions.description: Sets the value of an input element

arguments.name: Element
arguments.description: The DOM element that should receive focus

style.animation: 1s  linear 0ms infinite normal none running animation-cmESFi

style.transition: translate 250ms ease 0ms normal, top 150ms ease 0ms normal

style.background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #26262666 0%, var(--grey-900) 100%) scroll padding-box border-box repeat repeat 0% 0% / auto

arguments.name: URL
arguments.description: The URL to navigate to.

value.value: This page contains most standard signin methods. Magic link auth is under /magic.

When a user is not authenticated (access token not valid) and visits a protected page, they are redirected here. The refresh handler tries to refresh the session with the refresh token. 

If successfull, it will redirect to the protected page. If not, it will redirect to the /signin page
This page is required for social auth (OAUTH) and magic links. The handlers on this page take the codes provided by the mechanisms and sign the user in.

style.background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #26262666 0%, var(--grey-900) 100%) scroll padding-box border-box repeat repeat 0% 0% / auto

value.value: This page allows users to sign in and up via a magic link.

arguments.description: The URL to navigate to.

arguments.description: The key to be used in session storage.

arguments.name: Value
arguments.description: The value that should be saved in session storage. This can be anything that is serializable (String, Number, Boolean, Array or Object).

value.value: Enter your email address and we will send you a reset link.

value.value:
When users request new passwords via the forgot password flow, they will end up here. 

The handler will use the provided code to change the password.

arguments.description: The URL to navigate to.

Error.description: This event is triggered if the cookie could not be saved.
This event is triggered if the cookie could not be saved.

Success.description: This event is triggered once the cookie has been saved.

arguments.name: Name
arguments.description: The name of the cookie.

arguments.name: Value
arguments.description: The value to be stored in the cookie.

arguments.name: Expires in
arguments.description: (Optional) Time in seconds until the cookie expires. This should be null for JWTs to use the JWT's expiration. If not provided, the cookie will be a session cookie.

arguments.name: SameSite
arguments.description: (Optional) The SameSite attribute of the cookie. Defaults to Lax.

arguments.name: Path
arguments.description: (Optional) The Path attribute of the cookie. Defaults to /.

arguments.name: Include Subdomains
arguments.description: (Optional) Whether to include subdomains when setting the cookie. Defaults to true.
